gameDetails.name: The Oracle of Delphi: Seafarer Expansion
gameDetails.description:
Contained in Brettspiel Adventskalender 2016 for Day 1.

Cardboard tokens may be used to replace the wooden ships from the base game

Adds 2 new ships tiles to the game.

Rules: 
Add the new ship tiles to the original ship tiles before starting the game. Then distribute the tiles as described in the rule book.

Tiles:
During each of your turns, you may turn one oracle die to a color of your choice. After using the die, place it on this ship tile instead of the center of the oracle to indicate the tile's usage.  This function cannot be combined with an oracle card.

Your storage capacity is increased to 3. At the start of the game, take an offering of your choice from any island and place it in your storage
